select oh.id,oh.scrdailyId,oh.monthDay,oh.tradersTime,oh.successorTime,oh.projectId,oh.other,oh.employeeId ,oh.workingTime,e.name as employeeName,e.userNumber as employeeNumber from operatingHours oh left join employee e on e.id=oh.employeeId
and date_format(oh.monthDay,'%Y-%m') = date_format(#{monthDay},'%Y-%m')
and FIND_IN_SET(oh.employeeId,#{empIdStr})
and projectId=#{projectId}
ORDER BY oh.monthDay

SELECT DISTINCT substring_index( substring_index( mr.employee_id, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) AS employeeId, u.userNumber userNumber, u.userName, mr.end_time finish_date_time, DATE_FORMAT(mr.end_time,"%Y-%m") finish_year_month, DATE_FORMAT(mr.end_time,"%d") finish_day, mr.working_hour, "0" as type FROM maintain_record mr JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length(mr.employee_id) - length( REPLACE (mr.employee_id, ',', '') ) + 1 ) JOIN users u ON u.employeeId = substring_index( substring_index( mr.employee_id, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) WHERE mr.status='2' and mr.department_id=#{departmentId}
and mr.end_time like concat("%",#{date},"%")
and
mr.employee_id like concat("%",#{employeeId},"%")

SELECT DISTINCT substring_index( substring_index( de.empIds, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) AS employeeId, u.userNumber userNumber, u.userName, de.confirmer1Time finish_date_time, DATE_FORMAT(de.confirmer1Time,"%Y-%m") finish_year_month, DATE_FORMAT(de.confirmer1Time,"%d") finish_day, de.realExecuteTime working_hour, de.overtime, "1" as type FROM defect de JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length(de.empIds) - length( REPLACE (de.empIds, ',', '') ) + 1 ) JOIN users u ON u.employeeId = substring_index( substring_index( de.empIds, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) WHERE de.type=4 and de.departmentId=#{departmentId}
and de.confirmer1Time like concat("%",#{date},"%")
and
de.empIds like concat("%",#{employeeId},"%")

SELECT DISTINCT u.employeeId employeeId, substring_index( substring_index( mr.people, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) AS userNumber, u.userName, mr.datetime finish_date_time, DATE_FORMAT(mr.datetime,"%Y-%m") finish_year_month, DATE_FORMAT(mr.datetime,"%d") finish_day, mr.workingHours working_hour, "2" as type FROM maintenanceRecord mr JOIN mysql.help_topic b ON b.help_topic_id < ( length(mr.people) - length( REPLACE (mr.people, ',', '') ) + 1 ) JOIN users u ON u.userNumber = substring_index( substring_index( mr.people, ',', b.help_topic_id + 1 ), ',' ,- 1 ) where mr.type=1
and u.departmentId=#{departmentId}
and mr.datetime like concat("%",#{date},"%")
and
mr.people like concat("%",#{userNumber},"%")
